document_data.name: Khoroshen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Khoroshen''' was a tribe of [[lizardfolk]] who inhabited the low marshes of the [[Evermoors]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|17}}
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], First Speaker [[Tessarin Alaurin]] of the city of [[Nesmé]] recruited the tribe to help defend the city against [[troll]] and [[giant]] attacks.
document_data.Organization:
The tribe was led by [[Uhndek]],{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|18}} and most only spoke [[draconic (language)|Draconic]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|20}}

The Viperkin were a group of Khoroshen who carried shields adorned with a snake-like design, from which they derived their name.
